remarks: Implicit substitution of class for ordered pair.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-1995.)
statement:
optocl.1 $e |- D = ( B X. C ) $.
optocl.2 $e |- ( <. x , y >. = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
optocl.3 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. C ) -> ph ) $.
optocl $p |- ( A e. D -> ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ps x y $.
